titleStmt.title: Londons resurrection, poetically represented and humbly presented to His Most Sacred Majesty.
Londini renascentis imago poetica. English
titleStmt.author: Ford, Simon, 1619?-1699.

notesStmt.note: Writen by Simon Ford. Cf. Wing and NUC pre-1956.
Translation of: Londini renascentis imago poetica.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
